title: If you could bring the old Fiora back as a twin sister and keep the new Fiora too would you do it?
body:
It sure would be great to have the old Fiora back!

I think I say this daily in the message boards!

Why not have both the new and the old Fiora since they are basically two different champs!

What would you guys name the old Fiora if Riot brought her back for me one day!?

replies.body: as a bitter old midget, im offended

You're like that creepy stalker that worships the very ground someone walks on. 

You're Ezreal kisses Shyvanna's leg.
